job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Sr. Software engineer

This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building AI-centric products, utilizing generative AI for products and daily productivity, and lists specific generative AI technologies like LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude), embedding models, Vector indexing/database, RAG, and Agents. While it mentions software engineering, the core focus is on applying and developing with generative AI, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features' directly indicates understanding business needs and translating them into technical guidance.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams' shows an understanding of how new features fit into the broader system and business context.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity' indicates direct engagement with generative AI models for application development and operational efficiency.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept' suggests research and development activities, often involving prototyping models or AI approaches.
job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

job_tasks.justification: The inclusion of 'Docker, Kubernetes' and 'Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI' suggests involvement in deploying and managing applications in cloud environments, which is part of MLOps.
